19. Web Scraping and APIs

In this module, we will delve into web scraping techniques using libraries like Beautiful Soup and Scrapy.


19.1. Recommended YouTube Videos

  • Corey Schafer’s Web Scraping with Python and BeautifulSoup: https://youtu.be/XVv6mJpFOb0

  • Corey Schafer’s Python API Tutorials: https://youtu.be/9N6a-VLBa2I
